basics.name: Pablo Valenzuelaa
basics.label: Senior Full Stack Engineer and IT Consultant
basics.summary: Software Engineer with +16 years of experience, Postgraduate in PUC Project Management, attractive experience as Startup Founder, CTO, Project Manager, Senior Software Engineer, Rapporteur and with a broad vision that allows him to contribute, innovate and solve. He developed the first MVP for his Startup. He is responsible, techno-entrepreneur, focused on achieving goals, proactive, musician and athlete.

work.name: EHAC Group, Chile. S.A
work.position: Senior Full Stack Engineer, for project
work.summary: In 3 months I developed a customized ERP Software for my client's business sector and with various modules (finished project). I raised requirements from the Product Owner and together we defined Sprint with initial Backlog and respecting deadlines. Technologies used: React, Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Git and AWS(Lambda, Route53, S3, RDS and EC2).

work.name: Transport Casablanca S.A
work.position: Senior Full Stack Engineer, for project
work.summary: In 2 months I developed CRM modules to manage leads and requirements from forms on the corporate website. I defined requirements with Product Owner and Sprint with Backlog and respecting deadlines. Technologies used: React, Ruby on Rails, Bootstrap, Git and AWS (Lambda, Route53, S3 y RDS).

work.name: Ecoinput StartUp, Chile
work.position: Founder, Senior Software Engineer, CTO and part time Technology Advisor
work.summary: I created an agile cell in 2 months, aligned with the Startup BM canvas and for the development of the first MVP. I was responsible for all stages of the lifecycle, from requirements gathering to MVP deadline in production within 3 months. Coordinate schedule and critical path. I developed the Arturito Bot Web Application in 2 months and to improve SLAs and management of Ecoinput customer requests. Technologies used: Ruby, Ruby on Rails, React, Bootstrap, Python, Git and AWS (Lambda, Route53, S3, RDS, DynamoDB and Elastic Beanstalk).

work.name: Ripley Bank, Chile
work.summary: I formed and led a new agile outsourcing cell to resolve in less time and with higher quality the evolution of Product Owners of commercial business lines for banking core and external client portal, I managed a portfolio of 8 Tech projects, their programs and schedules using the best practices of Scrum and PMI. Technologies used: Jira, Confluence, DevOps, Kafka, AWS, JEE, DDD, Spring, Angular and Oracle DB.

work.name: Tessi Group, Chile
work.summary: I formed an agile cell in 2 months and with the necessary skills for the Banco BBVA Colombia client, I coordinated the entire life cycle of the Bank's Business Application, from gathering requirements with Product Owners to managing the roadmap, backlog and deadlines using Scrum and PMI best practices. Technologies used: Oracle WebLogic, DDD, DevOps, Kafka, BPM, Camunda, JEE, Angular, React, Node.JS and HTML5.

work.name: CMF (Commission for the Financial Market of Chile)
work.summary: I developed the evolutionary ones for the institutional Intranet and improvements to the SBIF API, I developed new components for purchasing and performance evaluation modules. I improved requirements gathering by implementing Scrum user stories, developed deliverable prototypes for the Product Owner and managed a portfolio of 3 technological projects. Technologies used: Java EE/Oracle Weblogic, Jboss, HTML5, Angular and Node.JS.

work.name: DIPRES - Chilean Ministry of Finance
work.summary: I developed the evolutions of the SIGFE 2 System and solved incidents reported in modules and collected requirements in user stories. Technologies used: Java JEE/SOA Oracle Web Services, Angular, DDD, DevOps, Spring Framework and Eclipse IDE.

work.name: The Andes, Chile
work.position: Part time IT Architect Java/Oracle/SOA Weblogic and WAS
work.summary: I was responsible for creating a technical report to suggest to the Development Engineer team a technological stack and good SOA practices to implement in business applications. I successfully managed to apply my knowledge of SOA and Oracle technologies previously gained as an IT Relator.

work.name: Linux Latin America, Chile
work.summary: I was a Rapporteur of courses to develop applications using Java, Oracle middleware, JEE, SOA, WebLogic, IBM WAS, enterprise application architecture and project management with Scrum. I managed to successfully complete all the courses taught at the Consultancy. Technologies used: Java, JEE, Oracle middleware, SOA, WebLogic and IBM WAS.

work.name: CMP Trainings, Chile
work.summary: I was Java/Oracle Advisor for the critical applications infrastructure project, Oracle WebLogic, Oracle DB, JSE/EE rapporteur, definition of the business domain model for the database and implementation of Scrum. I successfully advised my client before implementing an ERP system, promptly reporting the risks detected in the preliminary pre-project report.

work.name: Isamédica Clinic, Chile
work.summary: I developed a statistical management software project, defined a functional test plan, database standardization, documentation and control with Jira. I developed Web Application for statistical queries of the outpatient service, in parallel reports were created with SQL Views for the Clinical project for management. Technologies used: Oracle MySql, Microsoft Sql Server, SQL, HTML 5 and Web API.

work.name: Conicyt, Chile
work.summary: I developed two Software Projects (MVP) for Conicyt funding contests in Chile and respecting the initial schedule of 4 months until the pivot was put into production. Technologies used: MySQL, OOP, DDD, SOLID, HTML5 and Ruby on Rails.

work.name: Metalfue, Contractor at Codelco Chile
work.summary: I developed the Corporate Website, requirements gathering, creation of the Schedule, Hosting provider budget, VPS, deliverables, white equipment, production transition and documentation. Technologies used: Angular, Bootstrap, JavaScript, HTML5 and MySql.

education.area: Computer Engineer, mention in Systems Development
Diploma in Project Management with PMI certification
Product Development Seminar, IT marketing, Work Group and case studies
Innovation Seminar in IT and organizations

projects.name: Digital services quote advisor
projects.description: I developed for Ecoinput.com a virtual advisor that guides the prospect with a question-answer to choose the digital service that best suits their needs.

projects.name: Job English abbreviations
projects.description: Is a engine in Ruby that manager English words abbreviations and the save into a Hash.
